data.name: AnnotationDialog_DescriptionTooltip
data.value: Add a description to the annotation.

data.name: AnnotationDialog_FieldDescriptionTooltip
data.value: Pick the fields for the description or click Custom to enter your own text. To use a picture, pick a size, and then click Load Picture.

data.value: Pick a field to use for the title or click custom to enter your own.

data.value: Choose data fields you would like to add, or type your own.

data.name: AnnotationDialog_PictureTooltip
data.value: Add a picture to your annotation.

data.name: AnnotationDialog_TitleTooltip
data.value: Add a title to the annotation.

data.name: AudioSelectionDialog_Loop
data.value: Loop soundtrack until the video is finished

data.name: AudioSelectionDialog_Subtitle
data.value: This will add a soundtrack to your video.

data.name: AudioSelectionDialog_UnsupportedAudioFormatErrorMessage
data.value: Power Map can't use this soundtrack. Make sure the soundtrack doesn't have digital rights management protection and is an .mp3, .mp4, .wma, .wav, or .m4a file.

data.name: ChartDecorator_SortByTooltip
data.value: Sort by top or bottom 100 locations.

data.name: ChartDialog_Information
data.value: The chart will show the layer's locations by value.

data.name: ChartDialog_Instruction
data.value: Choose the layer you would like to base your chart upon.

data.name: CreateVideo_AudioEncodingErrorMessage
data.value: Sorry, we can't use this soundtrack. This may be because the soundtrack is corrupted or has been moved or deleted.

data.value: Are you sure you want to cancel video creation?

data.name: CreateVideo_Description1080p
data.value: For best viewing on high definition displays and presentations. 1080p

data.name: CreateVideo_Description360p
data.value: A smaller video for quick exporting and sharing on mobile devices. 360p

data.name: CreateVideo_Description720p
data.value: For best viewing on computer monitors and tablets. 720p

data.name: CreateVideo_DialogInstruction
data.value: Please choose a quality for your video:

data.name: CreateVideo_MediaFoundationMissingDialogText
data.value: Make sure Microsoft Media Foundation is installed.

data.name: CreateVideo_OpenFailedCaption
data.value: Failed to open the video file

data.value: Looks like the video file that you tried to open was moved or deleted from this folder.

data.value: An error occurred while creating the video.

data.name: CreateVideo_StatusInProgress
data.value: Creating your video. This could take a few minutes...

data.name: CreateVideo_VideoFileMissingError
data.value: An error occurred while creating the video. The video file may have been deleted or moved.

data.name: CustomSpaceGallery_DeleteMapText
data.value: If you delete this, it can't be undone and may affect other scenes and tours. Continue?

data.name: CustomSpaceGallery_DuplicateSceneDesc
data.value: Make a copy of the active scene.

data.name: CustomSpaceGallery_EarthMapName_CreateDesc
data.value: Make a new scene with a world background.

data.value: Change the active scene background to world.

data.name: CustomSpaceGallery_NewCustomMap_CreateDesc
data.value: Make a new scene with a new picture background.

data.name: CustomSpaceGallery_NewCustomMap_SelectDesc
data.value: Change the active scene background to a picture.

data.name: CustomSpaceGallery_SelectCustomMap_SelectDesc
data.value: Change the active scene background to {0}.

data.name: CustomSpaceSettings_BackgroundName_Tooltip
data.value: Give the custom map a name.

data.name: CustomSpaceSettings_ColumnFlip_Tooltip
data.value: Flips the order of data in the axis, changing the location of 0,0 on the map.

data.name: CustomSpaceSettings_ColumnMax_Tooltip
data.value: Enter the maximum values for the coordinates.

data.name: CustomSpaceSettings_ColumnMin_Tooltip
data.value: Enter the minimum values for the coordinates.

data.name: CustomSpaceSettings_ColumnOffset_Tooltip
data.value: Shifts the data left, right, up, or down by a percentage of its length. Enter a positive number to move the data in a positive direction.

data.name: CustomSpaceSettings_ColumnScale_Tooltip
data.value: Stretches or shrinks the data displayed over the map. Values between 0% and 100% shrink the height, thickness, or intensity; values larger than 100% stretch them.

data.name: CustomSpaceSettings_DialogIntroText
data.value: Adjust the coordinates to better fit your data to the map.

data.name: CustomSpaceSettings_OptionAutoDetect_Title
data.value: Auto detect X and Y values from my data

data.name: CustomSpaceSettings_OptionAutoDetect_Tooltip
data.value: Automatically detects the minimum and maximum values for the X and Y axis from your data.

data.name: CustomSpaceSettings_OptionAutoFit_Desc
data.value: Get the best fit based on your current data.

data.name: CustomSpaceSettings_OptionAutoFit_Tooltip
data.value: Automatically detects the minimum and maximum values for the X and Y axis from your data.

data.name: CustomSpaceSettings_OptionImage_Tooltip
data.value: Import a picture as a background map for your data.

data.name: CustomSpaceSettings_OptionIsLocked_Tooltip
data.value: Locks the values of the current coordinates.

data.name: CustomSpaceSettings_OptionPixelSpace_Tooltip
data.value: Aligns the coordinates to the pixels’ positions on the map.

data.name: CustomSpaceSettings_OptionSwapXY_Title
data.value: Swap the X and Y axis.

data.name: CustomSpaceSettings_OptionSwapXY_Tooltip
data.value: Swaps the data over the axis. Data being mapped on the X axis moves to the Y axis and vice versa.

data.name: CustomSpaceSettings_SelectImageErrorCouldntLoad
data.value: Power Map can't use this picture. It may be damaged, or might have been moved or deleted.

data.name: CustomSpaceSettings_SelectImageErrorTooBig
data.value: Power Map can't use this picture because it's too big. Make sure it's no larger than 4096 pixels on any side.

data.name: DefaultTourDescription
data.value: Some description for the tour goes here

data.name: DeleteLayerDialog_Description
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this layer? This operation cannot be undone.

data.name: Dialog_Done_Tooltip
data.value: Apply changes and close this dialog.

data.value: The City geography type should be selected only once

data.value: The Country/Region geography type should be selected only once

data.name: FieldListPicker_County_Duplicate
data.value: The County geography type should be selected only once

data.name: FieldListPicker_FullAddress_Duplicate
data.value: The Full Address geography type should be selected only once.

data.name: FieldListPicker_FullAddress_Other
data.value: The Full Address geography type has been selected with other geography types. Only Full Address will be used to map the data.

data.name: FieldListPicker_GeographyTypeTooltip
data.value: Pick a geographical type for each field that's shown on the map.

data.name: FieldListPicker_GeoMustBeInSameTableIsland
data.value: All the fields selected for the geography must be in the same table island.

data.name: FieldListPicker_Instruction_ChooseGeographyField
data.value: Choose the field(s) that make up the geography you would like to visualize.

data.name: FieldListPicker_Instruction_ChooseVisualizationField
data.value: Choose which fields you would like to visualize.

data.name: FieldListPicker_Latitude_Duplicate
data.value: The Latitude geography type should be selected only once

data.name: FieldListPicker_Latitude_Needed
data.value: The Longitude geography type has been selected. The Latitude geography type must also be selected.

data.name: FieldListPicker_Lat_Lon_Other
data.value: The Latitude, Longitude and other geography types have been selected. Only Latitude and Longitude will be used to map the data.

data.name: FieldListPicker_Longitude_Duplicate
data.value: The Longitude geography type should be selected only once

data.name: FieldListPicker_Longitude_Needed
data.value: The Latitude geography type has been selected. The Longitude geography type must also be selected.

data.name: FieldListPicker_OtherLocationDescription_Duplicate
data.value: The Other geography type should be selected only once.

data.name: FieldListPicker_OtherLocationDescription_Other
data.value: The Other geography type has been selected with other geography types. The Other geography type will be used to map the data.

data.name: FieldListPicker_Select_Geography
data.value: Select a column with geography data.

data.name: FieldListPicker_Set_Geography_Type
data.value: A geography type has not been selected for a column.

data.name: FieldListPicker_State_Duplicate
data.value: The State geography type should be selected only once

data.name: FieldListPicker_Street_Duplicate
data.value: The Street geography type should be selected only once

data.name: FieldListPicker_X_Duplicate
data.value: The X geography type should be selected only once

data.name: FieldListPicker_X_Needed
data.value: The Y geography type has been selected. The X geography type must also be selected.

data.name: FieldListPicker_X_Y_Other
data.value: The X, Y and other geography types have been selected. Only X and Y will be used to map the data.

data.name: FieldListPicker_Y_Duplicate
data.value: The Y type should be selected only once

data.name: FieldListPicker_Y_Needed
data.value: The X type has been selected. The Y type must also be selected.

data.name: FieldListPicker_Zip_Duplicate
data.value: The Zip geography type should be selected only once

data.value: The Category and Value field wells are in use. Please clear one of them before adding another field.

Power Map encountered an error when refreshing data. Please retry later.

data.name: Refresh_Error_RetryAfterCloseExcelDialog
data.value: Power Map encountered an error when refreshing data. If a dialog box is open in Excel, close it and then click Refresh Data again.

data.name: RegionShadingModeDisplayString_Global
data.value: Shade based on category value compared to all other values

data.name: RegionShadingModeDisplayString_Local
data.value: Shade based on category value within location

data.name: RegionShadingModeDisplayString_ShiftGlobal
data.value: Shade based on category value compared to other values in the category

data.name: Ribbon_AddLayerTooltip
data.value: Add another data layer to the selected scene.

data.name: Ribbon_AddSceneCustomTooltipDesc
data.value: Make a new scene with a map or a custom background

data.name: Ribbon_AddSceneTooltip
data.value: Add a new scene to the list of existing scenes in your tour.

data.name: Ribbon_AddSceneToolTipDescription
data.value: Adds a new scene to your tour. Several scenes make a tour.

data.name: Ribbon_CaptureScreenTooltip
data.value: Take a static picture of your current map to put it on the clipboard so you can paste it into another application.

data.name: Ribbon_ChartTooltip
data.value: Show the top or bottom 100 locations by value for any data layer on a 2D chart, and quickly navigate to each location.

data.name: Ribbon_CreateVideoTooltip
data.value: Turn your tour into video so you can share it.

data.name: Ribbon_DataShapesTooltip
data.value: Change the shape of the columns on the map.

data.name: Ribbon_DateAndTimeTooltip
data.value: Show or hide the date and time you've added to the Time box in the scene. This option is available when a time field is added to a scene's Time box.

data.name: Ribbon_FindLocationTooltip
data.value: Go to any city, address, state, or other geographical location on the map. Just enter the one you want.

data.name: Ribbon_FlatMapTooltip
data.value: Switch between globe and flat map format.

data.name: Ribbon_LayerSettingsButton_Desc
data.value: Change layer options such as data bars colors.

data.name: Ribbon_LegendsTooltip
data.value: Show the legends for all data layers in the scene. You can turn individual legends on or off afterwards.

data.name: Ribbon_MapLabelsTooltip
data.value: Show or hide the labels on the map.

data.name: Ribbon_NewSceneToolTipDescription
data.value: Make a copy of the active scene or create a new scene with a world map or a custom background.

data.name: Ribbon_NewTourToolTipDescription
data.value: Create a new animated tour of your data over geography and time.

data.name: Ribbon_PlayTourTooltip
data.value: Switch to tour view and watch it play.

data.name: Ribbon_PlayTourToolTipDescription
data.value: Play a tour after you have captured scenes.

data.name: Ribbon_RefreshDataTooltip
data.value: Update all layers of all scenes to show the most current data.

data.name: Ribbon_RefreshSceneToolTipDescription
data.value: Locks the scene after changing its contents.

data.name: Ribbon_SceneSettingsButton_Desc
data.value: Change scene options such as duration or scene type, or add effects.

data.name: Ribbon_TaskPanelTooltip
data.value: Show or hide the Layer Pane. Use the Layer Pane to manage layers, add data to layers, and change settings.

data.name: Ribbon_TextBoxTooltip
data.value: Add text to a scene that stays on screen when playing your tour. Resize or move it to the place you want.

data.name: Ribbon_ThemesTooltip
data.value: Pick a theme to give your tour instant personality or a more professional look. Each scene can have a different theme, and a theme can use different colors. Some themes even have satellite images for the globe.

data.name: Ribbon_TimeLineTooltip
data.value: Show or hide the Time Line control. Use this control to play a tour over time. This option is available when a time field is added to a scene's Time box.

data.name: Ribbon_TourEditorTooltip
data.value: Show or hide the Tour Editor. Use the Tour Editor to view all scenes in your tour and to rename your tour.

data.name: SceneSettings_BackgroundHeader_Text
data.value: Change the scene type and insert a picture as background for the data.

data.name: SceneSettings_BackgroundOptions_Text
data.value: Change background options for the active scene.

data.name: SceneSettings_DurationTooltip
data.value: Change the duration of scenes in seconds.

data.name: SceneSettings_EffectSpeedTooltip
data.value: Change the magnitude or speed of the scene effect.

data.name: SceneSettings_EffectTooltip
data.value: Change the motion effect for this scene.

data.name: SceneSettings_NameTooltip
data.value: Change the name of the scene.

data.name: SceneSettings_TransitionDurationTooltip
data.value: Change the time it takes to move to this scene from the previous scene.

data.name: SceneView_DeleteTooltip
data.value: Delete the selected scene. This action can be undone by clicking Undo on the Quick Access toolbar.

data.name: SettingsDialog_BalancedDescription
data.value: Balances graphics quality with smoothness on capable hardware.

data.name: SettingsDialog_CancelWarningMessage
data.value: Closing the Options window will cancel the currently running shrink operation.

data.name: SettingsDialog_QualityDescription
data.value: Favors high quality graphics, but may be slower on large data sets or slower machines.

data.name: SettingsDialog_SpeedDescription
data.value: Favors speed, but graphics quality may not be as sharp.

data.name: StatusBar_ResetTooltip

data.name: StatusBar_ZoomTooltip
data.value: Zoom to the selection on the map.

data.name: TaskPanel_NoDataMessage

Power Map needs data to work with.
Select a table or a range in Excel and click on "Add Selected Data to Power Map" under the Map button in the Insert tab of the ribbon.

data.value: Add a description to the text box.
